text: Regional Council elections were held in Réunion in 1986 as part of the wider French regional elections. The Rally for the Republic–Union for French Democracy alliance remained the largest in the Regional Council, winning 18 of the 45 seats.Regional Elections in Réunion French Politics ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|Rally for the Republic–Union for French Democracy|| ||36.78||18||0 |- |align=left|Communist Party of Réunion|| ||28.19||13||–3 |- |align=left|Miscellaneous right (Pierre Lagourgue)|| ||17.26||8||–3 |- |align=left|Socialist Party|| ||14.06||6||0 |- |align=left|National Front|| ||2.24||0||New |- |align=left|Miscellaneous right (Ramassamy)|| ||1.43||0||New |- |align=left|Total|| ||100||45||0 |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: French Politics |} ==References== Category:1986 elections in Africa Category:1986 elections in France 1986 Category:1986 in Réunion
title: 1986 Réunionese Regional Council election
